rukus.text: Netoto khwaloonga Omundu ne khwamanya shimubeyibeyinjia mumwoyo kukwe, nafu khuli ahambi khuye okhushila omusi kwo mwikosi we
Olwa Abamalaika babili balibukanana, owundi niyekhala omukhono omulunji ne owundi omukaata
Shiyakhaboola liosi liosi tawe halali Raqib nende Atid – balihambi naye (bakaandilka)
Ne tsisaalila tsiokhurula omwoyo tsiliitsa khubwatoto. Ako niko kawatechelelanga
Ne ulwika lulikhupwa, eyo niyo inyaanga yeyindukho
Ne buli Omundu aliitsa nali nende Omuliindi nende Omuloli
Aboolelwe mbu: “Toto ewe wali wang’ang’alila kano, mana khukhurere habulafu, kho okhulola khukhwo nyanga yino nokhulayi muno
Ne owashie aliboola mbu: “ wendi ninaye uno amalile okhurechekhwa.”
Ulia watsokaasia Nyasaye nende abanyaye baandi, mana musukune mushinyasio eshilulu
Owashe aliboola “ Nyasaye wanje Omulesi, esie shindamukosia tawe halali ye yali mubukori obwa ehale
Nyasaye aliboola mbu: “ mulasolana imbeli wanje tawe, ndamala okhubarumila amekanyilisio.”
Liumaho likalukhanibwa imbeli wanje tawe, ne esie shekholelanga Abasumba banje obubii tawe
